item.description:
RESCHEDULED due to (forecast) rain:

Let's meet for a post-4th "Parade of Shibas".



FOUR ACRES of FENCED space in Brookline! Our Shibas will have lots of room to play (and mine's favorite game is "catch me if you can", so I'll be the one with a tranquillizer gun and a net).

You can park (for free) in the daycare lot next door; there's also on-street parking (free on Sundays).

Coffee will be provided for those of you dismayed at the offensively early hour of this meetup
item.how_to_find_us: look for the park bench under the tree

group.name: Shiba Inu Meet Up of Eastern MA & Southern NH

item.name: Brookline meetup (again) - JULY 5th - Sunday @ 8:30am
